attributes.action: Please don't let Gordon Brown take over. You were bad.  He's worse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What can I say?  I come from an Old Labour family who believed in you.  Most are now dead or living in Australia.
You're a barrister not a politician.  Do something good for a change and for toots sake if u want people to love u then do a Hugh Grant and tell GW he's a nerd.  This country needs a GOOD PM
xx
